element.hint: Selects the call attribute to display in the ACP
element.label: Attribute
element.name: acp_id

element.hint: If the attribute is present, this URL will be screen popped on call accept
element.label: Screen pop URL
element.name: api_url

element.hint: Defines the label for this attribute
element.label: Label
element.name: label

element.hint: If set, will display this attribute only if the Language Code (locale) attribute matches
element.label: Language
element.name: language

element.hint: Sets the display order for this attribute within the set of attributes
element.label: Order
element.name: order

element.hint: If set, will display this attribute only if the Reason attribute matches
element.label: Reason
element.name: reason

element.hint: If a URL is entered here, the attribute will become a clickable link that will launch this URL when clicked
element.label: Action if clicked URL
element.name: sn_on_click

element.hint: If set, will display this attribute only if the Subreason attribute matches
element.label: Subreason
element.name: subreason
